defs: the tree Barringtonia racemosa of Lecythidaceae family; seaside Indian oak.
the herb, Narostachys jatamamsi; Indian spikenard.
the plant Nerium indicum ( = N. odorum, = N. oleander) of Apocynaceae family; Indian Oleander plant.
its flower.
= ಗಣಿಕೆಗಣ್ಣು.
= ಗಣಿಗಲು1.
the act, process or work of extracting ores, coal, etc. from a mine; mining.

= ಗಣಿಗಲು1.
a strong, bamboo basket used for storing grains.
a bamboo basket (in gen.).
a unit for measuring time; a duration of twenty-four minutes.
an earthen pot used as a percussion instrument.
a traditional school where holy scriptures are taught.
the plant Boerhaavia diffusa (- B. procumbens, = B. repens) of Nyctaginaceae family; the hog weed.
the plant Trianthema pentandra of Aizoaceae family.
counted; numbered; enumerated; reckoned with.
the act of counting, reckoning, etc.
the abstract science of number, quantity, and space studied in its own right or as applied to other disciplines such as physics, engineering, etc.; mathematics.
ಗಣಿತಮಾಡು gaṇita māḍu to count; to calculate; to enumerate; ಗಣಿತಹಾಕು gaṇita hāku = ಗಣಿತಮಾಡು.
a table of logarithms and trigonometric values etc.; mathematical table.
an expert or specialist in mathematics; a mathematician.
a man who foretells the future by studying the position of the moon, sun and stars, that is believed to affect human affairs and destiny; an astrologer.

a modern type of formal logic using special symbols for propositions, quantifiers, and relationships among propositions and concerned with the elucidation of permissible operations upon such symbols; mathematical logic.
= ಗಣಿತಜ್ಞ.
= ಗಣಿತಶಾಸ್ತ್ರ.

the group of sciences (including arithmetic, geometry, algebra, calculus, etc.) dealing with quantities, magnitudes, and forms, and their relationships, attributes, etc., by the use of numbers and symbols; mathematics.
the act or process of reckoning, enumerating, counting, etc.
an official, usu. periodic, count of population and recording of economic status, age, sex, language spoken, etc.; census.
a water-jug with a handle and a snout to pour water.

to count; to calculate; to reckon.

the ringing sound of bells; the sound produced when a metal is struck repeatedly; clang.
a sound imitating it.
to add up, one by one, by units or groups, so as to get a total; to count.
to reckon - a) to consider as; regard as being; b) to judge; consider; estimate.
a long bamboo staff.
a stick with zigzag surfaced head at one end, used to stir, beat or shake curd in a churn to make butter; a churn-stick.
a slender shaft with a pointed tip and other end being feathered used to be shot from a bow; an arrow.
an old unit for measuring the area of a land.
a stick of standard length used for this purpose.
the heavy wood or stone which by revolving in a mortar grinds oil-seeds to extract oil, in a bullock-driven oil mill.
a long pole with a broad blade at one end used for propelling or steering a boat; an oar.
the slender, jointed stem of plants as sugarcane, jowar, etc.
the long beam of the plough.
any of the farm implements, as plough, etc.; an agricultural implement.

ಗಣೆ ಮರ gaṇe mara (fig., sometimes sarc.) a tall, lean person; ಡೊಂಬರ ಸಾವು ಗಣೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ, ಬಿಲ್ಲವರ ಸಾವು ಮರದ ಮೇಲೆ ḍombara sāvu gaṇeya mēle, billavara sālu marada mēle (prov.) to him he who professes a dangerous profession for his living, the profession may itself prove to be fatal.
a man who performs tricks on a bamboo shaft; an acrobat.
a guard, watchman who holds a staff.
a man who propels boats by using oar or oars; an oarsman.
= ಗಣೆ.
to cause another person having supernatural revalations to foretell.
to predict something, waving a small wand, supposedly seen by other than normal sight; something perceived in a dream, trance, etc. or supernaturally revealed, as to a prophet; to foretell.
the elephant-headed, pot-bellied Hindu god of wisdom and remover of obstacles.

ಗಣೇಶನ ಮದುವೆ gaṇēśana maduve (fig.) a proposed performance, achievement, etc. accomplishment of which keeps postponed; ಗಣೇಶನ್ನ ಮಾಡುವುದಕ್ಕೆ ಹೋಗಿ, ಅವರಪ್ಪನ್ನ ಮಾಡಿದ gaṇēśanna māḍuvudakke hōgi avarappanna māḍida (prov.) said of the bad performance of an unskilled person who spoils whatever he or she attempts to do.
the festival worshipping Gaṇēśa, the god of wisdom and remover of obstacles, observed on the fourth day of Bhadrapada, the sixth month of Hindu lunar calendar.

its flower.

ಗಪ್ಪಾಗು gappāgu to keep quiet or silent; 2. to vanish from another's sight; to disappear; ಗಪ್ಪುಗಡದು gappu gaḍadu the condition or fact of being silent; ಗಪ್ಪು ಮಾಡು gappu māḍu to make another become silent; 2. to keep (something) from another's sight; to hide.
the condition or fact of being silent; ಗಪ್ಪುಗಾರಾಗು gappu gārāgu to restrain oneself from talking; to become silent.
to cease to be seen; to go out of sight; to disappear.
ಗಪ್ಪುಚಿಪ್ಪಾಗು gappu cippāgu to restrain oneself from talking; to become silent.
idle or baseless talk; gab; chatter.
= ಗಪ್ಫಾ; ಗಫಾ ಬಿಡು gaphā biḍu to talk much or idly; to chatter; to gabble.
a sound produced when something is snatched.
a sound imitating it.
(catching, snatching, eating, etc.) immediately; at once.

a good-looking man.
a stupid fellow.

to swallow hastily, greedily or in large amounts; to gulp.
any material rejected or thrown away as worthless; trash; refuse; rubbish.
a dirty fellow.
the condition, quality or period of being pregnant; pregnancy.
a hollow, muscular organ of female mammals in which the ovum is deposited and the embryo and foetus are developed; the womb.
ಗಬ್ಬವಾಗು gabbavāgu (now chiefly used of animals) to have an offspring or offsprings developing in the uterus; to become pregnant.
a high or overbearing opinion of one's worth or importance; inordinate self-esteem; haughty behaviour resulting from this; arrogance; pride.
the innermost part of a temple, where the idol of the main deity is installed; sanctum sanctorum.
the act of digging the earth; excavation.
the act of covering oneself throughout; pervasion.
the act of covering as with a screen, etc.
a variety in sugarcane.
to break up and remove or turn over soil, ground, etc., with a tool; to dig.
(surface of the earth) to sink in; to be depressed; to be dented.
to spread (oneself) throughout; to cover all or almost all the entire space, room, etc.; to pervade.
to be broken; to be split; to be smashed.
to make a heavy rumbling sound; to roar.
to ward off; to fend off.
to feel proud of; to be delighted or express happiness in one's own or another's achievements, etc.
a strong or offensive smell; a stench.
